name: Colour Beyond Time - (Adventuron) part 3
description:
This is the final part of Colour Beyond Time.

You need to play parts 1&2 and have the password. Enter the password and press enter at the start of this game.

Parts 1 & 2 are here:

https://jbizzel.itch.io/colour-beyond-time-adventuron

When you enter this version you may need to type 'quit' and 'yes' and this will restart the game, otherwise it may load your save from part 1 and 2.
